import React from 'react' import Navbar from '../adminnavbar/Navbar' import Navigation from '../verticalNavigation/Navigation' import {useState} from 'react' import axios from 'axios' import { ToastContainer, toast } from 'react-toastify'; import 'react-toastify/dist/ReactToastify.css'; toast.configure(); function Addcategory() { const [categoryname,setcategoryname]=useState("") const [slug,setslug]=useState("") const[description,setdescription]=useState("") const form =(e)=>{ console.log("what is done here") console.log(categoryname,slug,description) const value={"category_name":categoryname,"slug":slug,"description":description} axios.post("http://127.0.0.1:8000/newadmin/category/",value).then((Response)=>{ console.log("this is then") console.log(Response) .catch((error)=>{ console.log("this is error") }) }) } return (

Enter Category details

{setcategoryname(e.target.value)}} > {setslug(e.target.value)}} >
{setdescription(e.target.value)}}/>
) } export default Addcategory
